title: Studio near Opera
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Furnished studio near Opera and Galleries Lafayette. Quiet one way street. Small open kitchen, separate WC, and shower. Induction stove, washing machine, fridge. Wooden flooring, sofa cum bed. Building with lift. Hot water and room heating as well as building charges included in the price. Very well heated in winter.
Monthly rent : 860 euros including building charges heating and hot water.
Available from now onwards.
Direct owner. No broker fees.
